summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in Hero.tsx: the hero section now uses full viewport height (h-screen/min-h-screen) and the cruise ship image is positioned to cover the full area via object-cover with overlays to keep text readable. However, the diff also introduces an additional sunset background image layer and updates meta/state files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an additional full-screen background 'sunset' image layer behind the cruise ship hero image (potentially an unrequested visual change beyond adjusting layout/fit behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asked only to make the existing cruise ship hero image full-screen with cover behavior; it did not request adding a second background image asset/layer.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state metadata (project_state.json) marking/recording feature requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-1 implementation (styling/layout-only change) and not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added a generated frontend file summary listing many components/features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of implementing the hero full-screen image behavior.
